Posts.Content: Today has been one of those days where I can't stop crying and the feeling of lost and lonelyness. This journey has been truly awful and I'm feeling lower than ever. I'm sure tomorrow will be a better day but I just can't see that far.
Posts.Title: One of those days

Posts.Content: Hi karan. I've had a girly afternoon with my two daughters and we had a good cry together. I've made a appointment with gp tomorrow morning regarding the sense of depressed I have been feeling. I'm having chemo to manage the lung tumours. Thanks to everyone else to for the hugs. Just what I needed! Xx
Posts.Title: One of those days
